title: The technology that secures your stake
subtitle: A deep dive into the tech-stack and security exposure of validators run by Lavender.Five Nodes
summary: Discover how our validation service ensures top-notch security and performance with robust infrastructure. From geographically distributed bare-metal servers and secure key management to comprehensive performance monitoring and automated maintenance, learn how we maintain optimal validator operations across 50+ networks, offering unparalleled reliability and protection for our delegators.
author: Dylan Schultzie
